channel.title: Probabilistic Programming on Daniel Emaasit
channel.description: Recent content in Probabilistic Programming on Daniel Emaasit

item.title: ICYMI: Probabilistic Programming Roundup November 2017
item.description: In case you missed them, here are some articles from November 2017 of particular interest to users of Probabilistic Programming Languages(PPL). Uber AI Lab open sourced their deep probabilistic programming language called Pyro. Pyro is a tool for deep probabilistic modeling, unifying the best of modern deeplearning and Bayesian modeling. PyMC3 documentation was improved with new styling and builds on travis. You can help at this link. Prof.
